unit: Unit 8 | Inference for Categorical Data: Chi-Square
title: The Stat Project
question_text:
Lee's college Statistics class required students to perform and write up a test of significance. Lee was always interested in what kind of music people preferred. Lee selects a random sample of $100$ people in the age group of $18-35$ and $100$ people from the age group $36-55$. Then he asks for their musical preference for classical, rock, or jazz.
What type of test would be most appropriate for Lee to see if there are any differences in music preference between the two age groups?

choices.text: Test for the difference of two proportions
Chi-square test for goodness of fit
Test for the slope of a regression model
